title.narrative: Darfur Basic Services Project (DBSP) in Sudan (health)

description.narrative: The overall objective of this project is to contribute to reducing maternal and child mortality through strengthening the basic service delivery in South Darfur and East Darfur states. The present project is framed within the broader context of the recovery and social stability of the Darfur region.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)
United Nations agency, fund or commission (UN)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Sudan

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Sudan

description.narrative: South Darfur and East Darfur states, Sudan

sector.narrative: Multisector aid for basic social services

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
